answers.author: Philip Freeman
answers.text:
Mercy,
If you follow this link (http://www.albemarle.org/department.asp?department=hr&relpage=12583), you can select "Director of Information Technology" from the top drop-down menu and review our job description for this position. As an aside, although I do not believe it has to be a requirement, I have been very impressed by several IT employees -- in both of the local governments I have worked for -- who brought private sector IT experience with them.
Hope this helps!
-Philip
